thread.section_title: Library Hotel by Library Hotel Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect location and staff!
thread.title_full: Perfect location and staff! - Review of Library Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: MarinaCL
title: Perfect location and staff!
text:
We felt at home at this hotel, the staff were extremely kind and helpful and the room views and size were better than expected.
The breakfast and 24h snack services were amazing! Not to mention the cheese and wine every day at 17.00pm I would come back for sure! Thanks for a wonderful stay‚ù§
